      • notifyObserversUserData

        void notifyObserversUserData(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> userDataMap)
        Notify this subject's observers that the user data being requested is ready for reading.

        See also: UsersDatabaseServiceObserver.onUserData(Map).

        Parameters:

      • notifyObserversIfUserExists

        void notifyObserversIfUserExists(boolean exists,
                                 IUser otherUser)
        Notify this subject's observers whether a user exists in the database.

        See also: UsersDatabaseServiceObserver.onUserExists(IUser)} and UsersDatabaseServiceObserver.onUserDoesNotExist()

        Parameters:
        exists - true if the user exists in the database
        otherUser - the user whose existence was checked, if they exist.
